data: `minecraft:behavior.drop_item_for` allows the entity to move toward a target, and drop an item near the target. This goal requires a `minecraft:navigation` to execute.

data.Name: cooldown
data.Description: Total time that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again.

data.Name: drop_item_chance
data.Description: The percent chance the entity will drop an item when using this goal.

data.Name: entity_types
data.Description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to drop an item for.

data.Name: goal_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within the entity considers it has reached it's target position.

data.Name: loot_table
data.Description: The loot table that contains the possible loot the entity can drop with this goal.

data.Name: max_head_look_at_height
data.Description: The maximum height the entities head will look at when dropping the item. The entity will always be looking at its target.

data.Name: minimum_teleport_distance
data.Description: If the target position is farther away than this distance on any tick, the entity will teleport to the target position.

data.Name: offering_distance
data.Description: The preferred distance the entity tries to be from the target it is dropping an item for.

data.Name: on_drop_attempt
data.Description: The event to trigger when the entity attempts to drop an item.

data.Name: search_count
data.Description: The number of blocks each tick that the entity will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

data.Name: search_height
data.Description: The Height in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

data.Name: search_range
data.Description: The distance in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

data.Name: seconds_before_pickup
data.Description: The numbers of seconds that will pass before the dropped entity can be picked up from the ground.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the entity when using this Goal.

data.Name: target_range
data.Description: The range in blocks within which the entity searches to find a target to drop an item for.

data.Name: teleport_offset
data.Description: When the entity teleports, offset the teleport position by this many blocks in the X, Y, and Z coordinate.

data.Name: time_of_day_range
data.Description: The valid times of day that this goal can be used. For reference: noon is 0.0, sunset is 0.25, midnight is 0.5, and sunrise is 0.75, and back to noon for 1.0.
